author: Kosta Marcopulos
text:
Very unusual to see the the main domestic competitors overwhelmingly skew towards youth. Lille, Monaco, Nice, Lyon, Marseille, & Rennes are all structured for long term + sustainability. Financial impacts from COVID + TV rights defining some business models.
#Ligue1 https://t.co/N5xY1w1c02

author: Kosta Marcopulos
text:
I often see attacking brackets (CF, WA, AM) skew towards developing players. Believe this to be due to higher transfer fees typically demanded by those groups. Exciting to see a top 5 league have 47% of MP by Developing CBs; potential hotbed for future recruitment. 
#Ligue1 https://t.co/atoVHZ40OL

author: Kosta Marcopulos
text:
With all of the exciting young talent that France has come through France, we look at the breakdown of minutes played in Ligue 1. Ages 22-25 make up 4 of top 5 most minutes played. Tied youngest avg squad age across top 5 European leagues. Reliance on youth.
#Ligue1 https://t.co/ezMUlySBzE
